guest_0.Name: Ralph H. Baer
guest_0.Famous for:
Erfinder der Heimvideospiele. Hauptentwickler der Brown Box und sp[ä]ter der Magnavox Odyssey, der ersten Videospielkonsole der Welt.


Inventor of home video games. Main developer of the Brown Box and later the Magnavox Odyssey, the world's first video game console.

guest_1.Name: Hideo Kojima
guest_1.Famous for:
Leitender Entwickler von Metal Gear Solid und Death Stranding. Gr[ü]nder von Kojima Productions und ehemaliger Vizepr[ä]sident von Konami.


Lead designer of Metal Gear Solid and Death Stranding. Founder of Kojima Productions and former vice puserident of Konami.

guest_2.Name: Howard Phillips
guest_2.Famous for:
[Ö]ffentliches Gesicht von Nintendo of America in den 1980ern, damals bekannt unter seinem Pseudonym "Game Master". Sp[ä]ter Produzent und kreativer Leiter f[ü]r gro[ß]e Spielefirmen.


Public face of Nintendo of America in the 1980s, then known by his pseudonym "Game Master." Later producer and creative director for major game companies.

guest_3.Name: Don Daglow
guest_3.Famous for:
Industrieveteran seit den 1970ern. Entwickler von Spielen wie Dungeon, Utopia, Intellivision World Series Baseball, Amnesia und Neverwinter Nights. Gr[ü]nder von Stormfront Studios.


Industry veteran since the 1970s. Developer of games such as Dungeon, Utopia, Intellivision World Series Baseball, Amnesia and Neverwinter Nights. Founder of Stormfront Studios.

guest_4.Name: Ed Fries
guest_4.Famous for:
Leiter des Teams, das die originale Xbox-Spielkonsole entwickelte.


Head of the team that developed the original Xbox games console.

guest_5.Name: Steve Wozniak
guest_5.Famous for:
Mitgr[ü]nder von Apple. Entwickler der fr[ü]hen PCs Apple I und Apple II.


Co-founder of Apple. Developer of the early PCs Apple I and Apple II.

guest_6.Name: Nolan Bushnell
guest_6.Famous for:
Initiator der fr[ü]hen Arcadespiele Computer Space und Pong. Gr[ü]nder von Atari.


Initiator of the early arcade games Computer Space and Pong. Founder of Atari.

guest_7.Name: Nicolas Gaume
guest_7.Famous for:
Ehemaliger Pr[ä]sident des Verbands der franz[ö]sischen Videospielindustrie SNJV (Syndicat National du Jeu Video). Mitgr[ü]nder von Kalisto Entertainment und Mimesis Republic.


Former puserident of the French video game trade association SNJV (Syndicat National du Jeu Vid√©o). Co-founder of Kalisto Entertainment and Mimesis Republic.

guest_8.Name: Randy Pitchford
guest_8.Famous for:
Mitentwickler von Spielen wie Duke Nukem 3D, Shadow Warrior und Half-Life: Opposing Force. Mitgr[ü]nder von Gearbox Software, wo er unter anderem die Borderlands-Serie betreute.


Co-developer of games such as Duke Nukem 3D, Shadow Warrior and Half-Life: Opposing Force. Co-founder of Gearbox Software, where he oversaw the Borderlands series, among others.

guest_9.Name: Erik "Gronkh" Range & Valentin Matthias "Sarazar" Rahmel
guest_9.Famous for:
Let's Player und Streamer.


Let's players and streamers.

guest_10.Name: Ian Livingstone
guest_10.Famous for:
Mitgr[ü]nder von Games Workshop, Co-Autor der Fighting Fantasy-Rollenspielb[ü]cher und ehemaliger Vorstandsvorsitzender von Eidos.


Co-founder of Games Workshop, co-author of the Fighting Fantasy role-playing gamebooks and former executive chairman of Eidos.

guest_11.Name: Adrianne Shaw
guest_11.Famous for:
Gr[ü]nderin des LGBTQ-Spielarchivs. Spielwissenschaftlerin und au[ß]erordentliche Professorin im Bereich der Queer Game Studies.


Founder of the LGBTQ Game Archive. Game studies scholar and associate professor in the field of queer game studies.

guest_12.Name: Brenda Romero
guest_12.Famous for:
Seit 1981 Teil der Spielebranche. Autorin von Jagged Alliance 2, leitende Entwicklerin von Wizardry 8, Dungeons & Dragons: Heroes und Empire of Sin. Mitgr[ü]nderin von Romero Games.


Part of the games industry since 1981. Author of Jagged Alliance 2, lead designer of Wizardry 8, Dungeons & Dragons: Heroes and Empire of Sin. Co-founder of Romero Games.

guest_13.Name: John Romero
guest_13.Famous for:
Mitentwickler von Spielen wie Commander Keen, Wolfenstein 3D, Doom, Quake und Anachronox. Mitgr[ü]nder von id Software, Ion Storm und Romero Games.


Co-developer of games such as Commander Keen, Wolfenstein 3D, Doom, Quake and Anachronox. Co-founder of id Software, Ion Storm and Romero Games.
